channel.title: Live Streaming Development and Answering Questions
channel.description:
Hey guys!
I just wanted to let you know that I have started live streaming some development. The two projects I am working on are an independent Ruby base for an unknown protocol as of right now and an update to the Moparscape official server. I'd appreciate it if you came by and hang out.
I will answer all the questions that get posted in the chat to help people get acquainted with what is going on. I also am thinking in the future I will commentate when I program and make some videos to show people how I work through writing a server and the just general process/design/thought that goes into it.
http://www.twitch.tv/sinisoul
I will start recording past broadcasts although Im guessing it wont be as excited, I dont usually talk as of right now while I stream.
Thanks!

item.title: Live Streaming Development and Answering Questions
item.dc:creator: @sinisoul sini
item.description:
@sinisoul wrote:

[quote=“Rodgerwilco, post:47, topic:534369”][quote author=Pure_ link=topic=653166.msg4409896#msg4409896 date=1393220926]

It’s probably because sinisoul is the only one able to be in front of a camera while all the other gurus are too nerdy to even think about public speaking.
[/quote]Your claim is preposterous.

Now by guru I’m assuming you’re referring to our ‘elite moparisthebest squad’. I’m sure if you ask t4, tree, super, fat cookies even ^ they will help you. What they will not help you with is how to add a new teleport to your server or a new command (sometimes they do though). In my experience they tend to care more about server design rather than content implementation.

Guru as referenced to his Java Guru icon. t4, tree, super, fat cookies and those chumps are not an “elite moparisthebest squad” and should never be put in the same sentence as sinisoul. sini is starting a revolution, like you said the others just brain storm server design while sini get’s it done. Where all gonna make it brahs.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AdBoybKnzZw[/quote]

top kek

Read full topic

item.title: Live Streaming Development and Answering Questions
item.dc:creator: @sinisoul sini
item.description:
@sinisoul wrote:

[quote=“eyeownyew, post:44, topic:534369”]I don’t think that qualifies as public speaking
Honestly, it’s never occurred to me to even try such a thing
Plus I fudge up a lot so it’d be interesting to watch and less educational[/quote]

It isn’t.

[quote=“Pure_, post:45, topic:534369”][quote author=Rodgerwilco link=topic=653166.msg4409889#msg4409889 date=1393219585]
It’s probably because sinisoul is the only one able to be in front of a camera while all the other gurus are too nerdy to even think about public speaking.
[/quote]Your claim is preposterous.

Now by guru I’m assuming you’re referring to our ‘elite moparisthebest squad’. I’m sure if you ask t4, tree, super, fat cookies even ^ they will help you. What they will not help you with is how to add a new teleport to your server or a new command (sometimes they do though). In my experience they tend to care more about server design rather than content implementation.[/quote]

Most questions I answered were java specific.

item.title: Live Streaming Development and Answering Questions
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

[quote=“sinisoul, post:41, topic:534369”]Trying to take an initiative and help people is bad, right? On the flip side there are people more qualified to help than I am but won’t because they let their elitism attitude get in the way. People found it helpful, and if you’re not actively trying to be of any use to maybe sharing some of your knowledge to help those who are wanting to learn maybe you should can it.

I am too guilty of feeling entitled to tell people they shouldn’t do something when at least they are trying to put the effort in to reaching a goal. But that’s okay, that’s just in your nature.[/quote]

shots fired

Read full topic
item.source: Live Streaming Development and Answering Questions

@sinisoul wrote:

Trying to take an initiative and help people is bad, right? On the flip side there are people more qualified to help than I am but won’t because they let their elitism attitude get in the way. People found it helpful, and if you’re not actively trying to be of any use to maybe sharing some of your knowledge to help those who are wanting to learn maybe you should can it.

I am too guilty of feeling entitled to tell people they shouldn’t do something when at least they are trying to put the effort in to reaching a goal. But that’s okay, that’s just in your nature.
